metadata.description: Unified mock data configuration for modular chemical plants, combining process details and financial parameters for chat and build functions.

plant_templates.name: Modular Ammonia Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular ammonia synthesis from natural gas via Haber-Bosch process.

features: Skid-mounted modules for rapid deployment

plant_templates.name: Modular Methanol Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular methanol production from syngas.

features: Compact design, suitable for remote locations

plant_templates.name: Green Hydrogen Electrolyzer
plant_templates.description: Produces green hydrogen from water and renewable electricity.

features: Renewable Electricity Source: Wind or Solar PPA (Power Purchase Agreement)

plant_templates.name: Modular Urea Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular urea synthesis from ammonia and CO2 via Bosch-Meiser process.

features: Process Type: Stripping Process (e.g., Stamicarbon, Saipem)

plant_templates.name: Modular PET Resin Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular PET resin production from PTA and Ethylene Glycol.

features: Product Form: Solid pellets/chips

plant_templates.name: Biodiesel Microrefinery
plant_templates.description: Produces biodiesel from waste vegetable oil.

features: Feedstock Flexibility: Can process various lipid-based feedstocks (e.g., soy, canola, animal fats)

plant_templates.name: Modular Ethanol Fermentation Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces fuel ethanol from corn mash via fermentation.

features: By-product: CO2 (can be captured for CCU applications)

plant_templates.name: LNG Micro-Liquefaction Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular plant for liquefying natural gas for storage and transport.

features: Liquefaction Technology: Mixed Refrigerant or Nitrogen Expander Cycle

plant_templates.name: Modular SWRO Desalination Unit
plant_templates.description: Modular plant for producing potable water from seawater.

features: Energy Recovery: Uses Pressure Exchangers for high energy efficiency

plant_templates.name: Modular Lithium Hydroxide Converter
plant_templates.description: Converts spodumene concentrate to battery-grade lithium hydroxide.

features: Application: Production of battery-grade material for EVs

plant_templates.name: Modular Asphalt Mixing Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular plant for producing hot mix asphalt for road construction.

features: Operational Mode: Batch or Continuous

plant_templates.name: Modular Sodium Hypochlorite Plant
plant_templates.description: On-site production of bleach solution for water treatment.

features: Safety Feature: On-site generation reduces transport and storage of hazardous chemicals

plant_templates.name: Modular CO2-to-Methanol CCU Plant
plant_templates.description: Utilizes captured CO2 and green hydrogen to produce methanol.

features: Technology: Power-to-X (P2X) for renewable energy integration

plant_templates.name: Modular Nitric Acid Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces nitric acid from ammonia and air.

features: By-product: High-pressure steam for energy recovery

plant_templates.name: Modular Propylene Glycol Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces propylene glycol from propylene oxide and water.

features: Application: Food, cosmetics, and industrial uses

plant_templates.name: Modular TEG Reclamation Unit
plant_templates.description: Reclaims triethylene glycol for natural gas dehydration.

features: Application: Natural Gas Dehydration

plant_templates.name: Modular Sulfuric Acid Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces sulfuric acid from elemental sulfur and air.

features: Process: Double-Contact Process for high conversion efficiency

plant_templates.name: Modular Chlor-Alkali Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces chlorine, caustic soda, and hydrogen from saturated brine.

features: Technology: Ion-Exchange Membrane (IEM) technology for high purity products

plant_templates.name: Modular Carbon Black Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces carbon black from heavy hydrocarbon oil.

features: Waste Heat Recovery for steam generation
Integrated pelletizing and packaging unit

plant_templates.name: Modular Dimethyl Ether (DME) Plant
plant_templates.description: Produces clean-burning fuel from natural gas.

features: Compact, skid-mounted design for stranded gas monetization
High cetane number (55+) for use as a diesel substitute

plant_templates.name: Ethylene Production Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular ethylene production via steam cracking.

features: Co-produces propylene and other valuable byproducts

plant_templates.name: Polyethylene Plant
plant_templates.description: Modular polyethylene production from ethylene.

features: Flexible production of HDPE, LDPE, or LLDPE grades

technical_documents.title: Steam Methane Reforming Process
technical_documents.content: Steam methane reforming (SMR) is a key process for hydrogen production. The reaction occurs at high temperatures (800-900°C) and moderate pressures (15-30 bar) using nickel-based catalysts. The process converts methane and steam to hydrogen and carbon monoxide, followed by water-gas shift reaction to produce additional hydrogen.

technical_documents.title: Haber-Bosch Ammonia Synthesis
technical_documents.content: The Haber-Bosch process synthesizes ammonia from nitrogen and hydrogen at high pressure (150-300 bar) and moderate temperature (400-500°C) using iron-based catalysts. This process revolutionized fertilizer production and is essential for modern agriculture.

technical_documents.title: Steam Cracking for Olefins
technical_documents.content: Steam cracking is the primary method for producing ethylene and other olefins from hydrocarbons. The process operates at high temperatures (800-900°C) and low pressures (1-2 bar) without catalysts, thermally breaking down larger molecules into smaller ones.

technical_documents.title: Polymerization Processes
technical_documents.content: Polymerization converts monomers into polymers through various mechanisms including free radical, ionic, and coordination polymerization. Key factors include temperature, pressure, catalyst selection, and monomer concentration.

technical_documents.title: Modular Plant Design Principles
technical_documents.content: Modular chemical plants offer advantages in construction speed, cost control, and flexibility. Key design principles include standardized modules, skid-mounted equipment, and integrated control systems. This approach reduces construction time by 30-50% compared to traditional stick-built facilities.
